Html:
Hello,

Sorry if this has already been adressed but I cannot find an answer to my problem. I'm using VR Player with a cardboard on my Nexus 5 and it works well except that the orientation keeps drifting. What I mean is that the projection sometimes jerk one way or another and some other times it will very slowly drift to one side, resulting in a necessity to recalibrate every 30 seconds or so, pretty annoying.

I've tried all the different orientation settings, but the problem appears with all of them. Is there something wrong with my phone perhaps? It wouldn't be too much of a problem if I could use the magnetic trigger to recalibrate, however it doesn't seem to be recognized by the application.

Thank you.
